results.question: Is the AMF panel ready for transfer?

request.transcript: Is the AMF panel ready for transfer?

response.voice_response: Here's what I found for AMF Panel Readiness for Transfer. I've prepared a dashboard with 6 widgets showing the relevant data.

widgets.why: Shows the current status and all parameters of the AMF panel, indicating if it's ready for transfer.
widgets.description: Shows the current status and all parameters of the AMF panel, indicating if it's ready for transfer.

widgets.why: Displays the AMF panel's current operational status, providing a quick glance at its readiness.
widgets.description: Displays the AMF panel's current operational status, providing a quick glance at its readiness.

widgets.why: Shows the maintenance and operational history of the AMF panel, helping to identify any recent issues or scheduled maintenance.
widgets.description: Shows the maintenance and operational history of the AMF panel, helping to identify any recent issues or scheduled maintenance.

widgets.why: Lists any active alerts or warnings related to the AMF panel, indicating potential issues that need attention before transfer.
widgets.description: Lists any active alerts or warnings related to the AMF panel, indicating potential issues that need attention before transfer.

widgets.why: Compares the AMF panel's readiness with other similar equipment, providing context on its relative status.
widgets.description: Compares the AMF panel's readiness with other similar equipment, providing context on its relative status.

widgets.why: Displays the historical trend of the AMF panel's operational status, helping to identify any patterns or anomalies.
widgets.description: Displays the historical trend of the AMF panel's operational status, helping to identify any patterns or anomalies.
